en.title: Northern Lights Archive
en.label: Interactive web documentary · 2025
en.summary: A cinematic microsite that blends AI-assisted matte painting, WebGL, and original scoring to document stories from the Arctic Circle.
en.role: Direction · Web Design · WebGL · Motion · Sound
en.description:
Northern Lights Archive is an interactive web documentary that collects field stories from creators and researchers working in the Arctic circle. I layered practical footage with AI-generated light and ice textures, then stacked the scenes in WebGL to build an immersive narrative space.

The site follows a timeline structure backed by ambient sound layers, so visitors can move between chapters while listening to my original score. To keep performance consistent across devices, I wrote degradable GLSL effects and added Service Worker caching.
highlights: Hybrid library of AI and live-action textures cut visual production time by 40%
WebGL timeline synced with dynamic audio tracks to deepen immersion
Static build deployed with Eleventy + Netlify for flexible updates

zh.title: Northern Lights Archive
zh.label: 互動式網頁紀錄片 · 2025
zh.summary: 以 AI 光影與 WebGL 堆疊的互動紀錄片網站，記錄北極圈的田野故事。
zh.role: 導演 · 網頁設計 · WebGL · 動態 · 聲音
zh.description:
Northern Lights Archive 是一個互動式網頁紀錄片，記錄北極圈創作者與研究者的田野故事。我以實際拍攝素材作為基底，再透過 AI 生成的光影與冰晶紋理建立場景，最後以 WebGL 動態堆疊成沉浸式的敘事空間。

網站採用敘事時間軸與聲音層次的互動結構，使用者可以自由切換章節，同時聽見我自製的環境配樂。為了確保跨裝置效能，我以 GLSL 寫出可降階的特效，並搭配 Service Worker 緩存。
highlights: AI 與實拍混合的材質庫，縮短 40% 視覺製作時間
WebGL 與動態音軌同步，營造沉浸式體驗
以 Eleventy + Netlify 架構靜態站，確保部署與維護彈性
